row.abstract: Episcopalem sedem Suerinensem ecclesiaeque possessiones confirmat, petente Bernone episcopo. Lisch Mekl. Urk. III. 34, Hasselbach Cod. Pom. dipl. I. 107, Leuckfeld Chron. abb. Amelunxb. p. 52, Lünig Spic. eccl. II. app. p. 153, Schroeder Wismarische Erstl. p. 72, Meklenburg. Urkundenb. I. 120, (Origin. Guelf. III. Praef. p. 47, Migne 200 p. 1174).
